modName: Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs - Sexy Kunoichi Armor 2nd Conversion
summary: This is an armor conversion for "Sexy Kunoichi 2nd" by Nausicaa to work with the "Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs" body mod I created.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=6][u]Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs[/u][/size][size=6][u] - Sexy Kunoichi Armor 2nd Conversion[/u][/size][/b][/center]
This is an armor conversion for Sexy Kunoichi 2nd By Nausicaa -CBBE3 to make it compatible with my body mod "Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs"

[u][size=4]Required Mods[/size][/u]

Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by [b]Caliente - [/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
Sexy Kunoichi 2nd By Nausicaa -CBBE3 by [b]Nausicaa - [/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17876/?
Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs by Kiehazzu - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60280/?

[size=4][u]Not Required But Highly Recommended For Best Results[/u][/size]

Fair Skin Complexion by [b]HHaleyy - [/b][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?[/b]
[b]ApachiiSkyHair by [b]Apachii - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?[/b][/b]
[b]High Quality Eyes by [b]Xenius - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/498/?
[b]Inhabitants of Skyrim - NPC Overhaul by [b]Rops1981 - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23755/? (version 2)[/b][/b][/b][/b]

[size=4][u]Other Mods Used In Screenshots[/u][/size]

[b]Tropical Skyrim -- A Climate Overhaul by [b]Soolie - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33017/?[/b][/b]
[b]Amazing Follower Tweaks by [b]Dheuster - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?[/b][/b]

[u][b]Install Instructions[/b][/u]

[size=2]These are instructions for getting a result pictured in the screenshot

1) Install Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente

During installation, select the "skinny" option, check the box that says "vanilla shape" and select the "Faces" option

2) Install ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii

3) Install High Quality Eyes by Xenius

4) Install Inhabitants of Skyrim - NPC Overhaul by Rops1981

5) Install Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs

6) Install Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy choosing the "skinny" settings and making sure "Eyes" remains unticked

7) Install Sexy Kunoichi 2nd By Nausicaa -CBBE3 by Nausicaa

8) Install [/size][size=2]Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs - Sexy Kunoichi Armor 2nd Conversion[/size]
author: Kiehazzu
